channel.title: CVE Feed for happyplugins -- Shortcodes AnyWhere
channel.description: The latest CVEs for happyplugins -- Shortcodes AnyWhere

item.title: CVE-2024-9581|2024-10-10T16:18:14.848Z -- happyplugins -- shortcodes%20anywhere
item.description: The Shortcodes AnyWhere plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary shortcode execution in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.1. This is due to the software allowing users to execute an action that does not properly validate a value before running do_shortcode. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary shortcodes.

item.title: CVE-2024-9581|2024-10-10T02:06:09.396Z -- happyplugins -- shortcodes%20anywhere
item.description: The Shortcodes AnyWhere plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary shortcode execution in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.1. This is due to the software allowing users to execute an action that does not properly validate a value before running do_shortcode. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary shortcodes.
